name: Challenge Foot Senior
overview: Become the president of a prestigious club, its renowned coach, its most talented player! Buy one of 32 top European clubs and raise big money from grants, sponsors and TV rights. Show initiative, intelligence and nerve! Transfer star players to your club who will bring you additional advantages during the matches. To win on the pitch, you have to behave exactly as in reality and follow as closely as possible the spirit and rules of modern football. Infinite possibilities of movements and tactical combinations. In the senior version, complete management of faults: touch, corner, offside, free kick, expulsion, penalty... This exciting simulation plunges you into the exciting atmosphere of major international competitions and will make you experience
